title: Living Lahaina
overview: Meet some of Lahaina's biggest slackers and sickest surfers, Alex, Casey, Sean, Dave, Kimo, and Matt. These guys live a lifestyle revolving around brews, babes, and waves. When they are not hitting the waves, these guys can be found hitting the Lahaina party scene and hooking up with the ladies. Can these lords of the boards manage to balance their partying with their pro surfing aspirations? Will these boys survive their crazy lifestyles? Will Kimo keep them all in check? Or will Casey lead them off the deep end in some sick partying? Watch the season to find out. First episode has character analysis
